content: I didn't see you around today. Were you out adventuring, or did you fall into a cave? Wait, you got lost too, didn't you?
info: 闲聊-玩家上线情况反馈-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>!
Why have you been cooped up at home all day?
Come out and have some fun, bhan!
info: 闲聊-玩家上线情况反馈-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
That's right, after a good meal, it's time to run wild!
Bhan, you've spent just as much time outdoors as I have today!
info: 闲聊-玩家上线情况反馈-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊
